content: i have been making barefoot sandals for a friend lately as she absolutely lives them and i thought we needed a more kick-ass design i love skulls so why not skull barefoot sandals this is heavily based off of two other free patterns that i have used and loved the ever-popular skull shawl found here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/skull-shawl-doskallesjal and the pineapple-up barefoot sandals found here http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pineapple-up-barefoot-sandals without these amazing designers i wouldn t have had the jumping-off point for my own design
